hero.title: Unlock hidden video insights with Samba AI's lens.
hero.text: Videos processed in the last 24 hours

leaderboard.subtext: We index everything happening across linear and streaming video - all in real-time.

semasio.headline: Contextual insights & targeting for the open web, including over 2.5 billion webpages scanned monthly.
semasio.subtext: With the acquisition of Semasio, Samba now has the most extensive map of user intention in the world across the open web and TV.

video.text: See What AI Sees: Every Scene, Brand, and Moment Decoded
video.subtext: Samba has led the industry for years by live-decoding video with our pioneering content recognition technology, and now Samba AI has a deeper unprecedented understanding of video context.

layers.headline: The world's most advanced AI intent prediction engine
layers.subtext: Samba AI identifies and activates user ATTENTION and activates their INTENTION by mapping video viewership directly to the advertising graph.

track.headline: Track every ad, across every market, while it's happening
track.subtext: No one knows video advertising like Samba, our actionable insights and statistics help you put your message in just the right place.

end.subtext1: Samba AI Finds Your Target Audience
